amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for military bands to play in social functions, dances, and other events that are outside the competencies of the military.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 48 printed in House Report 114-623 to limit the Defense Department from using money to have musical military units perform in an official capacity for certain entertainment purposes in 10 U.S.C. 974, including dinners, dances, and social events.
